CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentration of inorganic phosphorus species (element or compounds) in any phase of the atmosphere
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Inorganic phosphorus species concentrations in the atmosphere
Phos_At
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.237+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentration of inorganic silicon species (element or compounds) in any phase of the atmosphere
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Inorganic silicon species concentrations in the atmosphere
Silic_At
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.239+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Insect (Class Insecta) and earthworm (Subclass Oligochaeta) abundance per unit area of bed (sea, river, lake etc.) parameters presented at the level of taxa that may be mapped to entities in the ITIS taxonomy. Includes animals normally considered as planktonic if they have been returned from sediment samples. This parameter group has been implemented to separate predominantly freshwater taxa from predominantly marine taxa.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Insect and earthworm taxonomy-related abundance per unit area of the bed
InsWorm_tax_abund_bed
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.241+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Insect (Class Insecta) and earthworm (Subclass Oligochaeta) abundance per unit area of the littoral zone (between spring tide high and low water) parameters.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Insect and earthworm taxonomy-related abundance per unit area of the littoral zone
InsWorm_Tax_Litabund
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.245+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Insect (Class Insecta) and earthworm (Subclass Oligochaeta) ash-free dry weight biomass per unit area of bed (sea, river, lake etc.) parameters presented at the level of taxa that may be mapped to entities in the ITIS taxonomy. Includes animals normally considered as planktonic if they have been returned from sediment samples. This parameter group has been implemented to separate predominantly freshwater taxa from predominantly marine taxa.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Insect and earthworm taxonomy-related ash-free dry weight biomass per unit area of the bed
InsWorm_tax_afdw_biomass
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.247+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Insect (Class Insecta) and earthworm (Subclass Oligochaeta) ash-free dry weight biomass per unit area of the littoral zone (between spring tide high and low water) parameters.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Insect and earthworm taxonomy-related ash-free dry weight biomass per unit area of the littoral zone
Littoral_TaxInsectWormAFDW
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.251+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Insecta abundance parameters presented at the level of taxa that may be mapped to entities in the ITIS taxonomy. These may be at any taxonomic level from sub-species upwards.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Insecta taxonomy-related abundance per unit volume of the water column
Insect_taxa_abund
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.253+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Insecta carbon biomass parameters presented at the level of taxa that may be mapped to entities in the ITIS taxonomy. These may be at any taxonomic level from sub-species upwards.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Insecta taxonomy-related biomass expressed as carbon per unit volume of the water column
Insect_txax_C_abund
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.256+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters expressing the mean nett transport rates within the water column like Lagrangian currents. Note this is an unintentional duplicate of VDFC.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Lagrangian currents and transport rates in the water column
Lagran_Currents_WC
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.258+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters relating to land surface temperature including fire and other hot spot location
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Land surface temperature
LandTemp
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.260+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters relating to land (including marshes and the intertidal zone) vegetation
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Land vegetation
LandVeg
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.262+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Water column spectral absorption parameters
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Light absorption in the water column
WC_LightAbsorb
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.264+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters relating to the extent of light penetration into the water column
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Light extinction and diffusion coefficients
Extco
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.284+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters describing rocks on the basis of physical characteristics such as colour, structure, mineralogy and grain size
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Lithology
Lithology
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.286+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters describing the abundance and nature of material classed as refuse introduced to the environment by activities of man.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Litter abundance and type
Litter
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.288+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:name: Long-wave radiation
LWRad
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.290+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters relating to diseases and parasites of macroalgae (Rhodophycota, Chromphycota, Chlorophycota) and seagrass (Charophyta, Anthophyta) and damage to seagrass beds
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Macroalgae and seagrass infection and damage
AlgaeDis
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.293+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Macroalgae (Rhodophycota, Chromphycota, Chlorophycota) and seagrass (Charophyta, Anthophyta) count parameters presented at the level of taxa at any level from sub-species upwards. Count includes presence/absence indicators.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Macroalgae and seagrass taxonomy-related counts
Macroalgae+Seagrass_taxa_count
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.295+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Any enumeration (e.g. count, number per litre) of macroalgae (seaweeds) designated by terms other than taxonomic names (e.g. total) in any fresh or salt water body.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Macroalgae generic abundance in water bodies
MacAlgaeGenAbundWater
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.297+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameterisations of the intensity and inclination of Earth's magnetic field
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Magnetics
Magnetics
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.299+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters relating to human built structures on the coast or offshore and their impact on the environment.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Man-made structures
Structures
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.301+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters related to the study of human interaction with the sea through the investigation of associated physical remains, be they vessels, shore side facilities, port-related structures, cargoes, human remains or submerged landscapes
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Marine archaeology
MarineArch
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.304+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters quantifying the extent and nature of recreational activities in coastal waters, estuaries and their margins such as beaches.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Marine environment leisure usage
MarLeisUse
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.306+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Data parameters that carry information relating to a measured parameter such as measurement temperatures, integration depths, quantities sampled and incubation durations
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Metadata parameters
Metadata_param
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.308+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Metal concentrations in either whole organisms or their constituent parts.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Metal concentrations in biota
Met_Biota
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.317+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentrations of metal elements per unit weight of sediment. Sediment is understood to be the solid phase of the bed, including the recently settled material sometimes known as fluff collected from the bed surface.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Metal concentrations in sediment
Met_Sed
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.321+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentrations of metal elements in sediment pore waters
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Metal concentrations in sediment pore waters
Met_SedPW
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.323+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentrations of metal elements in suspended particulate material collected by water column filtration, centrifugation or sediment trapping. Deprecated as semantic overlap with MTWP.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Metal concentrations in suspended particulate material
Met_SPM
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.326+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentration of metal elements in any phase of the atmosphere
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Metal concentrations in the atmosphere
Met_At
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.328+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentration parameters for metallic elements in ice and snow
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Metal concentrations in the cryosphere
Met_Ice
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.331+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters quantifying the exchange of metalsbetween the bed (ie the sediment) and the water column sometimes termed benthic fluxes
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Metal fluxes between the bed and the water column
WCBed_MetalFlux
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.333+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters concerned with the complexation of metals as ligands in the water column
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Metal ligand parameters in the water column
WC_MetalLigand
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.335+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters relating to the uptake rates of metals from the dissolved phase into the particulate phase
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Metal uptake rates in the water column
WC_MetalUptake
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.338+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Any enumeration (e.g. count, number per litre) of microzooplankton (free swimming heterotrophic organisms smaller than 200um) designated by terms other than taxonomic names (e.g. total) in any fresh or salt water body.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Microzooplankton generic abundance in water bodies
MicrozooGenAbundWater
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.340+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters that express the consumption of the phytoplankton population by the microzooplankton. Generally the results of dilution experiments on water samples screened through a 200-micron mesh.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Microzooplankton grazing
WC_MicrozooGraz
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.343+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Basically, any microzooplankton carbon biomass measurement that isn't included in parameter group MATC. May include data integrations such as 'total microzooplankton'.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Microzooplankton non taxonomy-related biomass expressed as carbon per unit volume of the water column
WC_NontaxMicrozooCarbBiomass
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.345+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Any enumeration (e.g. count, number per litre) of microzooplankton (free swimming heterotrophic organisms smaller than 200um) designated by taxonomic names (e.g. species, genus or family) in any fresh or salt water body.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Microzooplankton taxonomic abundance in water bodies
MicrozooTaxaAbundWater
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.347+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Microzooplankton carbon biomass parameters presented at the level of taxa that may be mapped to entities in the ITIS taxonomy. These may be at any taxonomic level from sub-species upwards., but exclude morphological classifications such as 'heterotrophic flagellate'.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Microzooplankton taxonomy-related biomass expressed as carbon per unit volume of the water column
Microzoo_taxa_C_biomass
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.351+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Microzooplankton surface area per unit volume of the water column parameters presented at the level of taxa that may be mapped to entities in the ITIS taxonomy. These may be at any taxonomic level from sub-species upwards.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Microzooplankton taxonomy-related biosurface area per unit volume of the water column
WC_TaxMicrozooSurfArea
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.355+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Microzooplankton biovolume parameters presented at the level of taxa that may be mapped to entities in the ITIS taxonomy. These may be at any taxonomic level from sub-species upwards.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Microzooplankton taxonomy-related biovolume per unit volume of the water column
WC_TaxMicrozooBiovol
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.357+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Chemical analyses of minerals extracted from rocks or sediment or analysed in-situ using techniques like the electron microprobe.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Mineral chemistry
Min_chem
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.359+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters describing or quantifying the mineralogical composition of rocks and unlithified sediments.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Mineralogical composition
Min_comp
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.362+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Any parameters relating to molecular biology or genetics
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Molecular biology parameters
MolecularBiol
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.365+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters expressing depth (possibly as pressure) of an instrument on a suspended underwater mooring. These are primarily collected to monitor mooring performance by quantifying knock-down and should not be regarded as instrument z co-ordinates (accurate calibration is rare) or as sea level measurements.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Moored instrument depth
Depth
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.368+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters quantifying the uptake rate of nitrate or gaseous nitrogen by flora and fauna living in any body of salt or fresh water
CodeDefinition.gml:name: New production in water bodies
New_prod
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.371+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Nitrate concentration parameters (including statistical parameters such as standard deviation) in the water column. Includes nitrate+nitrite, which is often loosely referred to as nitrate.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Nitrate concentration parameters in the water column
WC_NO3
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.373+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Deprecated term from a misguided attempt to distinguish between NO3 and NO3+NO2 for discovery. Use parameter group NTRA instead
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Nitrate+nitrite concentration parameters in the water column
WC_NO3+NO2
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.376+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters relating to the rate of nitrification (oxidation of reduced nitrogen such as ammonium) in the water column
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Nitrification rate in the water column
WC_Nitrif
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.378+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Nitrite concentration parameters (including statistical parameters such as standard deviation) in the water column
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Nitrite concentration parameters in the water column
WC_NO2
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.381+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentrations of total, organic and inorganic nitrogen per unit weight of sediment. Sediment is understood to be the solid phase of the bed, including the recently settled material sometimes known as fluff collected from the bed surface.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Nitrogen concentrations in sediment
Sed_Nitrogen
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.383+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentrations of total, organic and inorganic nitrogen per unit weight of suspended particulate material collected by water column filtration, centrifugation or sediment trapping. Note that it is common practice to assume all nitrogen in SPM is organic.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Nitrogen concentrations in suspended particulate material
SPM_Nitrogen
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.386+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Nutrient (nitrate, nitrite, ammonium, phosphate, silicate and urea) concentrations in sediment pore waters
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Nutrient concentrations in sediment pore waters
SedPoreWat_Nuts
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.388+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters quantifying the exchange of nutrients between the bed (ie the sediment) and the water column sometimes termed benthic fluxes
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Nutrient fluxes between the bed and the water column
WCBed_NutFlux
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.391+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters associated with the measurement of ocean colour, including visible waveband satellite spectral radiometer measurements, their calibration measurements (spectral water-leaving radiance and reflectance) and chart colour estimates.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Ocean colour and earth-leaving visible waveband spectral radiation
Ocean_clr
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.394+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Includes all parameters covering the strength of electromagnetic radiation signal return, including absolute measurements of returning signal strength as well as parameters expressed as backscatter (the proportion of transmitted signal returned)
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Optical backscatter
OptBS
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.396+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters relating to the rates of creation and consumption of organic sulphur compounds (such as DMS and carbonyl sulphide) in the water column
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Organic sulphur compound dynamics in the water column
WC_OrgSulphDyn
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.399+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: All measurements of the quantity or mass of any organometallic compound in any living organisms or their component parts
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Organometallic species concentration parameters in biota
Biota_OrganoMet
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.401+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: All organometallic compound concentration parameters (including saturations for gaseous species) in all phases of sediments (including pore waters)
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Organometallic species concentration parameters in sediments
Sed_OrganoMet
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.405+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: All organometallic compound concentration parameters (including saturations for gaseous species) in all phases of any body of fresh or salt water
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Organometallic species concentration parameters in water bodies
Water_OrganoMet
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.408+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: All organosulphur compound concentration parameters (including saturations for gaseous species) in all phases of the water column
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Organosulphur species concentration parameters in the water column
WC_OrgS
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.411+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Fluxes of species other than metals and nutrients between the bed (ie the sediment) and the water column sometimes termed benthic fluxes or sediment demand
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Other fluxes between the bed and the water column
OthFlux_WCBed
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.414+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentrations of volatile halocarbons (compounds comprising carbon atoms covalently bonded to fluorine, chlorine, bromine or iodine atoms) other than tracers (i.e. freons/chlorofluorocarbons) and contaminants in any body of fresh or salt water.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Other halocarbon concentrations in water bodies
Haloc_WC
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.416+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters relating to the rates of creation and consumption of volatile halocarbons (compounds comprising carbon atoms covalently bonded to fluorine, chlorine, bromine or iodine atoms) other than tracers (i.e. freons/chlorofluorocarbons) and contaminants in any body of fresh or salt water.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Other halocarbon dynamics in water bodies
HalocDynam_WC
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.419+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Bucket group for parameters that cannot be classified elsewhere
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Other meteorological measurements
UnclassMet
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.422+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters that do not easily fit into any of the other SPM data categories.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Other physical and chemical properties of suspended particulate material
SPM_Properties
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.424+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Statistical parameters derived from wave data expressing wave properties other than height, period and direction
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Other wave statistics
Oth_WaveStat
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.427+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters related to the rates of oxygen production and consumption
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Oxygen production and respiration in the water column
WC_O2Prod+Resp
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.429+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Ozone and oxygen concentration parameters in any phase of the atmosphere (but usually the gaseous phase)
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Ozone and oxygen concentrations in the atmosphere
Atm_O3_Oxy
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.432+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameterisations that describe climatic conditions in the past. Includes climate indices, climate indicators and indirect measurements of climate-related phenomena such as sea level and water table depth.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Palaeoclimatic indicators and parameters
PalaeoInd
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.435+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:name: Partial pressure (pCO2) and fugacity (fCO2) of carbon dioxide in the water column
WC_pCO2
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.437+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters quantifying the amount of organic compounds containing both a carboxyl group and an amino group in solids suspended in a body of water.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Particulate amino acid concentrations in the water column
Water_coll_part_AA
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.440+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentrations of inorganic carbon in the particulate phase of the water column as extracted by a fitration technique. This is the particle-bound concentration per unit volume of the water column. Consequently, it is both a function of the SPM concentration in the water column and the concentration of inorganic carbon per unit weight of the SPM.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Particulate inorganic carbon concentrations in the water column
WC_PartInorgC
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.443+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentration parameters for metallic elements in the particulate phase of the water column collected by fitration, centrifugation or sediment trapping
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Particulate metal concentrations in the water column
Met_WC_Part
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.446+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentrations of total and organic carbon in the particulate phase of the water column as extracted by a filtration technique. This is the particle-bound concentration per unit volume of the water column and is both a function of the SPM concentration in the water column and the concentration of carbon per unit weight of SPM. Total and organic carbon are classed together to circumvent confusion caused by total carbon data sets labelled 'POC' on the assumption that the inorganic carbon fraction is negligible
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Particulate total and organic carbon concentrations in the water column
WC_POC
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.449+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentrations of total and organic nitrogen in the particulate phase of the water column, which is a function of both the SPM concentration in the water column and the concentration of nitrogen per unit weight of SPM. Note that it is commonly assumed that all particulate nitrogen is organic.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Particulate total and organic nitrogen concentrations in the water column
WC_PON
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.452+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentrations of total and organic phosphorus in the particulate phase of the water column, which is a function of both the SPM concentration in the water column and the concentration of phosphorus per unit weight of SPM.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Particulate total and organic phosphorus concentrations in the water column
WC_PartP
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.455+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentration parameters for trace metalloid elements in the particulate phase of the water column collected by fitration, centrifugation or sediment trapping. Trace metalloids are considered as B, Ge, As, Sb, Te and Po (but not Si which is classed separately because of its major role in environmental chemistry)
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Particulate trace metalloid concentrations in the water column
Metoid_WC_Part
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.458+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters quantifying the magnitude of naturally occurring low frequency earth movements such as used for earthquake seismology and natural noise studies.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Passive seismic refraction
PassSeisRefrac
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.460+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentration parameters for substances synthesised by man to kill other life forms in either whole organisms or their constituent parts.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Pesticide concentrations in biota
Pesticide_Biota
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.463+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentration parameters for substances synthesised by man to kill other life forms in sediment, which is considered to be anything from the bed sampled by a grab or corer, including 'fluff'.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Pesticide concentrations in sediment
Pesticide_Sediment
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.467+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentration parameters for substances synthesised by man to kill other life forms in either solution or suspension (i.e.includes measurements in both the dissolved and particulate phases) in any body of salt or fresh water.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Pesticide concentrations in water bodies
Pesticide_WaterBody
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.470+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Includes all variants of phaeopigment (chlorophyll degradation products). Sediment is defined as any solids collected by a corer, including fluff..
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Phaeopigment concentrations in sediment
Sed_PhaeoPigs
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.473+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Includes all variants of phaeopigment (chlorophyll degradation products) expressed in terms of per unit volume or unit area of the water column. Does not include data expressed per unit mass of SPM.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Phaeopigment concentrations in the water column
WC_PhaeoPigs
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.476+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentration parameters for substances synthesised by man to modify bodily function or diagnose, cure, mitigate, treat, or prevent disease in either whole organisms or their constituent parts.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Pharmaceutical concentrations in biota
Pharm_Biota
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.479+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentration parameters for substances synthesised by man to modify bodily function or diagnose, cure, mitigate, treat, or prevent disease in sediment, which is considered to be anything from the bed sampled by a grab or corer, including 'fluff'.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Pharmaceutical concentrations in sediments
Pharm_Sediment
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.482+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentration parameters for substances synthesised by man to modify bodily function or diagnose, cure, mitigate, treat, or prevent disease in either solution or suspension (i.e.includes measurements in both the dissolved and particulate phases) in any body of salt or fresh water.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Pharmaceutical concentrations in water bodies
Pharm_WaterBody
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.485+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Phosphate concentration parameters (including statistical parameters such as standard deviation) in the water column
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Phosphate concentration parameters in the water column
WC_PO4
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.487+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentrations of total, organic and inorganic phosphorus per unit weight of sediment. Sediment is understood to be the solid phase of the bed, including the recently settled material sometimes known as fluff collected from the bed surface.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Phosphorus concentrations in sediment
Sed_Phosphorus
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.490+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentrations of total, organic and inorganic phosphorus per unit weight of suspended particulate material collected by water column filtration, centrifugation or sediment trapping.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Phosphorus concentrations in suspended particulate material
SPM_Phosphorus
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.493+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentration of phycobolin group pigments such as phycocyanin and phycoerythrin in the water column
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Phycobolin pigment concentrations in the water column
WC_PhycobolPig
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.496+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Any enumeration (e.g. count, abundance) of free-floating autotrophic biological entities designated by terms other than taxonomic names (e.g. microphytoplankton, ciliate, flagellate) in any body of fresh or salt water.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Phytoplankton generic abundance in water bodies
PhytoGenAbundWater
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.499+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Any parameterisation of biomass (e.g. wet weight, dry weight, carbon, nitrogen etc.) of free-floating autotrophic biological entities designated by terms other than taxonomic names (e.g. microphytoplankton, ciliate, flagellate) in any body of fresh or salt water.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Phytoplankton generic biomass in water bodies
PhytoGenBiomWater
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.502+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:name: Phytoplankton growth
Phyt_Growth
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.505+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Any enumeration (e.g. count, abundance) of free-floating autotrophic biological entities designated by taxonomic names (e.g. species, genus, family) in any body of fresh or salt water.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Phytoplankton taxonomic abundance in water bodies
PhytoTaxaAbundWater
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.508+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Any parameterisation of biomass (e.g. wet weight, dry weight, carbon, nitrogen etc.) of free-floating autotrophic biological entities identified by their taxonomic names (e.g. family, genus, species) in any body of fresh or salt water.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Phytoplankton taxonomic biomass in water bodies
PhytoTaxaBiomWater
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.521+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Any parameterisation of cell surface area of free-floating autotrophic biological entities designated by taxonomic names (e.g. species, genus, family) in any body of fresh or salt water.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Phytoplankton taxonomic surface area in water bodies
PhytoTaxaAreaWater
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.535+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Any parameterisation of cell volume of free-floating autotrophic biological entities designated by taxonomic names (e.g. species, genus, family) in any body of fresh or salt water.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Phytoplankton taxonomic volume in water bodies
PhytoTaxaVolWater
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.538+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Used for plankton abundance parameters where no differentiation between phytoplankton, microzooplankton or zooplankton is possible
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Plankton abundance per unit volume of the water column
WC_PlanktonAbund
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.541+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Used for plankton carbon biomass parameters where no differentiation between phytoplankton, microzooplankton or zooplankton is possible
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Plankton biomass expressed as carbon per unit volume of the water column
WC_PlanktonCarbBiomass
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.544+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters that describe the displacement of platforms or instruments in space relative to various origins
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Platform or instrument orientation
PlatOrientation
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.547+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters quantifying the accidental spillage of liquid or dry pollutants from vessels or marine industries. Parameters may include quantities of pollutant, areas affected and event duration.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Pollution events
PollutEvnt
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.550+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters relating to all kinds of precipitation (rain, snow, etc.) and water loss from the surface of the Earth
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Precipitation and evaporation
Precip+Evap
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.553+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentration of any chemical species in water collected from the atmosphere. Includes rain, snow, hail and fog but excludes cloud samples or snow accumulations on the ground.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Precipitation chemistry
Precip_Chem
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.556+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters associated with the quantification of primary production. This is defined as the fixation of carbon dioxide into either organic or inorganic carbon by living entities and so includes photosynthesis and calcification.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Primary production in the water column
WC_PrimaryProd
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.559+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:name: Quality control flags
QC_Flag
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.563+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters quantifying the amount of liquids (e.g. ship's ballast) or solids (e.g. dredge spoil) deposited into the water column as a result of man's activities
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Quantity of material dumped
Amount_dumped
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.566+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Includes all parameters covering the strength of emitted microwave radiation return, including absolute measurements of returning signal strength as well as parameters expressed as backscatter (the proportion of transmitted signal returned)
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Radar backscatter
RadarBScatter
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.569+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters quantifying the level of radioactive emissions from in-situ geologic units
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Radiation geophysics
RadGeophys
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.573+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: All parameters associated with radioactivity in either whole organisms or their constituent parts
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Radioactivity in biota
Biota_RadAct
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.576+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: All parameters associated with radiocativity in the water column, including radiation counts, isotope activities and activity ratios. Activities per unit mass of SPM are included
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Radioactivity in the water column
WC_RadAct
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.579+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:name: Raw X-Ray fluorometer (XRF) output from sediment samples
XRFCnt
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.583+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters as logged by measuring devices, including raw counts/voltages and ADCP relative velocities
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Raw current meter output parameters
Raw_CM_Parm
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.586+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Output as logged from any type fluorometer.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Raw fluorometer output
RawFluorometerOutput
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.589+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Raw concentration parameters from a gas analyser such as a LiCor
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Raw gas analyser output
Raw_gas
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.593+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Direct output parameters from spectophotometric or chemical in-situ nutrient analysers
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Raw in-situ nutrient analyser output
Raw_Nuts
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.596+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:name: Raw light meter output
RawLightOutput
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.599+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Raw parameters (usually membrane current and temperature) from dissolved oxygen sensors
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Raw oxygen sensor output
RawO2Output
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.602+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Raw parameters (voltages and counts) from in-situ suspended particulate material sensors including transmissometers, nephelometers and in-situ particle sizers
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Raw suspended particulate material optical sensor output
Raw_SPM_optics
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.605+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Direct output parameters from TS instruments such as thermosalinograph or CTD
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Raw temperature and/or salinity instrument output
Raw_TS
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.608+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:name: Redox potential in sediment
Sed_RedoxPot
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.611+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Reduction rates of any species in sediment cores
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Reduction rates in bed sediments
Sed_Red_Rt
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.614+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Data record, event, sample or measurement reference numbers
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Reference numbers
Refno
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.617+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters quantifying the uptake rate of nitrogen from excretion products (ammonium and urea) by flora and fauna living in any body of salt or fresh water
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Regenerated production in water bodies
Reg_prod
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.620+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters related to the abundance of reptiles (Class Reptilia)
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Reptile abundance
ReptAbund
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.624+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters relating to diseases and parasites of reptiles (Class Reptilia)
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Reptile disease and parasites
ReptDis
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.627+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters related to the reproduction of reptiles (Class Reptilia)
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Reptile reproduction
ReptRepr
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.630+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters related to the volume of water passing through a point in a river system per unit time, including the rates of freshwater, dissolved material and particulate load discharge from a river into the sea.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: River flow and discharge
Riv_flow_discharge
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.634+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Measured or stratigraphically estimated ages of lithified sediments, igneous rock or metamorphic rock.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Rock age
RockAge
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.637+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters decribing aspects of a geologic unit that are the result of bulk chemical, mineralogical or physical changes related to change in the physical or chemical environment. Includes weathering, supergene alteration, hydrothermal alteration and metasomatic effects not considered metamorphic.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Rock alteration
RockAlt
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.640+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters specifying the physical dimensions of the particles comprising lithified sedimentary rocks (including expressions of shape such as aspect ratio) and statistics derived from their variation in a sample (e.g. mean, mode, sorting, skewness).
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Rock grain size
RockGrainSize
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.643+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parmeters describing the space for fluids or gases within a geologic unit comprising lithified sediments, igneous rock or metamorphic rock.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Rock porosity and permeability
RockPoros
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.646+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters that describe the distribution of the degree of hotness within geologic units of lithified sedimentary, igneous of metamorphic rock.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Rock temperature
RockTemp
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.650+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters that describe the degree to which sedimentary, igneous or metamorphic rocks are able to conduct heat
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Rock thermal conductivity
RockThermCond
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.653+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters quantifying the concentration of sodium chloride in any body of water at any point between the bed and the atmosphere
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Salinity of the water column
WC_Sal
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.656+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Measurements and predictions of the displacement of the water column surface from a fixed, stable reference
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sea level
Sea_Level
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.659+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Measurements of the displacement of the water column surface from a fixed, stable reference expressed as either total pressure or sea pressure
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sea level expressed as pressure
SeaLvl_Press
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.663+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Digital images of the seabed obtained using either still or video cameras
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Seabed photography
BedPhoto
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.666+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters that specify the number of specified members of Family Phocidae present at a particular time and location, including presence/absence indicators.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Seal abundance
Seal_Abund
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.670+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters describing the actions or reactions of seals (Family Phocidae), usually in response to the environment. Includes both parameters mapped to taxa and those mapped to non-taxonomic groupings.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Seal behaviour
Seal_Behav
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.673+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters describing the size, shape or physiological activity including disease and parasite infection status of seals (Family Phocidae). Includes both parameters mapped to taxa and those mapped to non-taxonomic groupings.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Seal morphology and physiology
Seal_Morph_Phys
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.676+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters describing the causes and rate of mortality of Seals (Family Phocidae). Includes both parameters mapped to taxa and those mapped to non-taxonomic groupings.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Seal mortality
Seal_Mort
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.679+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters related to the reproduction of seals (Family Phocidae)
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Seal reproduction
SealRepr
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.683+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Measurements of optical visibility in the water column
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Secchi disk depth
Secchi
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.686+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters used to encode information specifying access rights to data, usually in terms of authorised roles
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Security tags and keys
Sec_Key
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.689+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters quantifying the volume, mass or thickness of particulate material that gathers on the seabed per unit time.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sediment accumulation rate
AccumRate
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.693+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters relating to the elucidation of sediment structure by quantifying the proportion of waves from a low energy source reflected by sub-surface layers.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sediment acoustics
Sed_acoustics
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.696+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Measured or stratigraphically estimated ages of marine sediments
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sediment age
Sed_Age
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.699+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters specifying the physical dimensions of the particles comprising unlithified sediment (including expressions of shape such as aspect ratio) and statistics derived from their variation in a sample (e.g. mean, mode, sorting, skewness).
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sediment grain size parameters
Sed_GrainSize
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.703+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Lipids are defined as small water-insoluble biomolecules including fats, fatty acids, esters, sterols, isoprenoid compounds, etc.. Sediment is defined as material collected by a corer (including fluff).
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sediment lipid concentrations
Sed_Lipids
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.707+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters relating to the size, shape and form of microfossils in sediment samples
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sediment microfossil morphology parameters
Sed_FossilMorph
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.710+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sediment pollen content
Sed_Pollen
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.714+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sediment resistivity
Sed_Resist
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.717+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters quantifying the critera for and extent of sediment resuspension
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sediment resuspension
Sed_resus
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.720+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters that describe the degree to which unlithified sediment is able to conduct heat
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sediment thermal conductivity
SedThermCond
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.724+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Sediment porosity (water content by volume) and water content by weight parameters
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sediment water content, porosity and surface area
Sed_WaterCont
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.727+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters characterising structure in sedimentary rocks and unlithified sediment such as bedding, lamination and bioturbation.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sedimentary structure
Sed_struct
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.730+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sedimentation flux of alkenones and alkenoates in the water column
WC_SedFluxAlkeno
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.734+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters quantifying the amount of organic compounds containing both a carboxyl group and an amino group (including compounds such as salts and esters) sinking vertically as particles through a unit area of a water body in units time.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sedimentation flux of amino acids and associated compounds in water bodies
WaterSedFlux_AminoAcidCmpd
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.737+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Flux of biological detritus (material derived from the water column such as exuvia and faecal pellets) in the water column
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sedimentation flux of biological detritus in the water column
Biodetritus_WCFlux
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.741+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sedimentation flux of carbohydates in the water column
Carb_flux
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.744+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Fluxes of particulate total, organic and inorganic carbon (including as CaCO3) and nitrogen (often measured as 'total' but assumed to be 'organic'). Organic matter is defined as matter lost on ignition.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sedimentation flux of carbon, nitrogen or organic matter in the water column
WC_SedFluxOrgMatter
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.748+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Fluxes of any biota or remains thereof (excluding faecal pellets which are classed as SPM) downwards through the water column
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sedimentation flux of identified biota expressed as carbon in the water column
WC_SedFluxCellsCarb
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.751+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Fluxes expressed as number per unit area per unit time of any biota or remains thereof (excluding faecal pellets which are classed as SPM) downwards through the water column
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sedimentation flux of identified biota in the water column
WC_SedFluxCells
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.755+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters quantifying metal and metalloid fluxes as element concentration or isotope activities per unit area per unit time
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sedimentation flux of metallic and metalloid elements and isotopes in water bodies
Metal_flux
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.758+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Quantity of any inorganic species such as silicon (opal) and phosphorus passing through unit area of the water column in unit time. Carbon and nitrogen are regarded as organic and explicitly excluded
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sedimentation flux of non-metallic inorganic species in the water column
WC_SedFlux_nonmet
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.762+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sedimentation flux of pigments in the water column
Pig_flux
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.766+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Fluxes of terrestrial biological or lithological material
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sedimentation flux of terrestrially derived material in the water column
Terr_Flux
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.769+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters expressing the total sedimentation flux in terms of particle mass, volume or counts
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sedimentation flux quantification in the water column
WC_SedFlux
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.773+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters relating to the elucidation of geological structure by quantifying the proportion of waves from a high energy source reflected by sub-surface layers.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Seismic reflection
Reflection
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.776+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters relating to the elucidation of geological structure by quantifying the refration of waves from a high energy source by sub-surface layers.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Seismic refraction
Refraction
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.780+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Paramaters that quantify the numbers or amount of living material of shellfish (molluscs - including cephalopods - and crustaceans of interest to fisheries research and commercial fisheries) in any body of fresh or salt water.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Shellfish abundance and biomass in water bodies
Sfish_AbundBiom
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.783+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Paramaters that quantify the size, shape, age and life processes (including mortality) of shellfish (molluscs - including cephalopods - and crustaceans of interest to fisheries research and commercial fisheries).
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Shellfish morphology, age and physiology
Sfish_MorphAgePhys
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.787+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Paramaters that quantify the fecundity, reproductive rates or nature of reproduction in shellfish (molluscs - including cephalopods - and crustaceans of interest to fisheries research and commercial fisheries).
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Shellfish reproduction
Sfish_Rep
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.791+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: A technique for mapping the morphology of the seafloor using a sonar swath projected sideways from a towed underwater vehicle.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Side-scan sonar
Side_Scan
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.794+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Silicate concentration parameters (including statistical parameters such as standard deviation) in the water column
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Silicate concentration parameters in the water column
WC_SiO4
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.798+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Temperature of the water column surface as measured by a radiometer. It does NOT include temperature measurements in the upper few metres of the water column such as thermosalinograph data
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Skin temperature of the water column
Skin_temp
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.801+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters related to the chemical composition of any kind of water sample that was frozen solid at the time of sampling or measurement
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Snow and ice chemistry
SnowIce_Chem
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.805+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Measurements of quantity (mass), thickness and spatial extent of snow and ice
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Snow and ice mass, thickness and extent
SnowIce_Amount
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.809+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters related to physical properties (e.g. colour, density, in-situ temperature) or characteristics (e.g. sea ice type) of any kind of water sample that was in its solid state at the time of sampling or measurement
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Snow and ice physical properties and characteristics
SnowIce_PhysChar
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.812+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters quantifying the irradiance of the sun impinging on the Earth's surface in the visible and infra-red waveband, generally accepted as wavelengths between 300 and 3000 nm
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Solar Radiation
Sol_Rad
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.816+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sound velocity and travel time in the water column
WC_SoundVel
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.820+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters for directional and non-directional spectral wave data, excluding wave directions derived from spectral data.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Spectral wave data parameters
SpectWaveParm
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.823+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Measured or stratigraphically estimated ages of secondary mineral deposits in caves. This includes stalactites, stalagmites, flowstone, and crystal growths.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Speleothem age
Speleo_Age
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.827+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Stable isotope enrichment parameters from measurements on living (at the time of sampling) organisms or parts thereof
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Stable isotope enrichment in biota
Iso_Biota
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.831+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Stable isotope enrichment parameters in frozen precipitation (snow, hail, ice and slush), its accumulations (e.g. glaciers), sea ice and frozen fresh water.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Stable isotope enrichment in ice and snow
Iso_IceSnow
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.835+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Stable isotope enrichment parameters in sediment, including biota-associated parameters such as isotope enrichment in foraminifera tests
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Stable isotope enrichment in sediment
Iso_Sed
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.839+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters quantifying the relative proportions of stable isotopes in either the solute or solvent phase of sediment pore waters
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Stable isotope enrichment in sediment pore waters
Iso_SedPoreWater
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.843+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Stable isotope enrichment parameters in secondary mineral deposits in caves. This includes stalactites, stalagmites, flowstone, and crystal growths.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Stable isotope enrichment in speleothems
Iso_Speleo
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.846+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Stable isotope enrichment parameters in both the gaseous and aerosol phases of the atmosphere
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Stable isotope enrichment in the atmosphere
Iso_Atmos
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.850+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Stable isotope enrichment parameters in both the dissolved and particulate phases of the water column
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Stable isotope enrichment in the water column
Iso_WC
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.854+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters describing or predicting water column structure plus parameters quantifying the dynamic stability of that structure
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Structure and stability of the water column
Struct_WC
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.858+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentration of sulphur species (element or compounds) in any phase of the atmosphere. Includes sulphur dioxide.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Sulphur species concentrations in the atmosphere
Sulph_At
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.861+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters quantifying the amount of compounds that lower the surface tension of a liquid, the interfacial tension between two liquids, or that between a liquid and a solid in any body of salt or fresh water. The term surfactants includes detergents, wetting agents, emulsifiers, foaming agents and dispersants.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Surfactant concentrations in water bodies
WC_surfactant
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.865+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters relating to the abundance, size and morphology of particle aggregates in the SPM
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Suspended particulate material aggregates
SPM_aggreg
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.869+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Includes all SPM grain size measurements and derived statistics
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Suspended particulate material grain size parameters
SPM_GrSize
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.873+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:name: Suspended particulate material setting velocity parameters
SPM_SettVeloc
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.877+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters that describe the distribution of the degree of hotness within a body of rock or unlithified sediment.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Temperature of geological units
GeolTemp
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.881+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Temperature parameters in any body of water at any point between the bed and the atmosphere excluding the top few microns sampled by radiometers known as the skin
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Temperature of the water column
WC_Temp
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.884+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters expressing the variation of temperature in the water column either as a function of space or of time
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Temperature variation in the water column
WC_TempVar
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.888+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters quantifying and categorising terrestrially-derived detritus (eg dust and pollen) in the water column
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Terrestrial detritus in the water column suspended particulate material
WC_Terrdetritus
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.892+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters relating to the mapping of terrestrial features, including coastlines
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Terrestrial mapping
Land_map
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.896+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters relating to the water held by land masses such as soil and vegetation moisture content
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Terrestrial water content
LandWet
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.900+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters relating to structure beneath sea-bed determined by the reflection of seismic energy along multiple parallel tracks.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Three-dimensional seismic reflection
3DSeisReflec
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.904+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:name: Total dissolved inorganic carbon (TCO2) concentration in the water column
WC_TCO2
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.908+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Carbonate system parameters (DIC/TCO2, pH, alkalinity, pCO2) in sediment pore waters
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Total dissolved inorganic carbon (TCO2) in sediment pore waters
SedPoreWat_TCO2
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.912+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentration parameters for metal elements in the combined dissolved and particulate phases of any body of fresh or salt water.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Total metal concentrations in water bodies
Met_WC_Tot
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.916+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentration parameters for trace metalloid elements in either whole organisms or their constituent parts. Trace metalloids are considered as B, Ge, As, Sb, Te and Po (but not Si which is classed separately because of its major role in environmental chemistry)
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Trace metalloid concentrations in biota
Metoid_Biota
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.920+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentration parameters for metalloid elements in sediment. Sediment is understood to be the solid phase of the bed, including the recently settled material sometimes known as fluff collected from the bed surface. Metalloids are considered as B, Ge, As, Sb, Te and Po (but not Si which is classed separately because of its major role in environmental chemistry)
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Trace metalloid concentrations in sediment
Metoid_Sed
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.923+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Concentration parameters for trace metalloid elements in water occupying the space between sediment grains. Trace metalloids are considered as B, Ge, As, Sb, Te and Po (but not Si which is classed separately because of its major role in environmental chemistry)
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Trace metalloid concentrations in sediment pore water
Metoid_SedPW
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.927+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters relating to the rate of electromagnetic radiation intensity decrease as it travels through the water column
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Transmittance and attenuance of the water column
WC_Trans+Attn
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.931+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters quantifying the level of activity moving people or cargo from one place to another.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Transport activity
TransAct
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.935+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters describing the transport of material, heat or energy in the water column
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Transport in the water column
WC_Transport
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.939+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Measured parameters expressing turbulence in the water column plus parameters derived from these measurements
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Turbulence in the water column
WC_Turbulence
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.943+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters relating to structure beneath sea-bed determined by the reflection of seismic energy along a single track.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Two-dimensional seismic reflection
2DSeisReflec
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.947+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters relating to the intensity of ultra-violet radiation in either the atmosphere or the water column
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Ultra-violet (UV) radiation
UVRad
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.951+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Includes all pigments that cannot be explicitly classified as chlorophylls, phaeopigments or carotenoids (usually groups of pigments). Sediment includes anything collected by a grab or corer, including the fluff layer from the top of the consolidated sediment.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Unclassified pigment concentrations in sediment
Sed_Pigments
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.955+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Includes all pigments that cannot be explicitly classified as chlorophylls, phaeopigments or carotenoids. Generally, these are parameters where different pigments have been grouped together. Concentrations are expressed in terms of per unit volume or unit area of the water column. Does not include data expressed per unit mass of SPM.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Unclassified pigment concentrations in the water column
WC_Pigments
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.959+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: The identity of the parameter is not declared. Covers cases such as internal working parameters and dummy channels.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Unspecified
Unspec
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.963+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Uptake of nutrients other than nitrogen species (ie phosphate and silicate) by the water column
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Uptake of other nutrients in the water column
OthNut_WCUp
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.967+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Urea concentration parameters (including statistical parameters such as standard deviation) in the water column
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Urea concentration parameters in the water column
WC_Urea
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.971+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters measured by variable fluorescence instruments such as pump and probe and fast repetition rate fluorometers
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Variable fluorescence parameters
Var_fluor
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.976+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Parameters quantifying the upward and downward motion of objects mounting sensors or collecting samples.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Vertical platform movement
VertPlatVelocity
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.980+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: All vertical spatial parameters including depth, height and pressure when used as an independent variable.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Vertical spatial coordinates
Vert_spac_coord
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.984+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Vertical water movement parameters including non-directional speeds
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Vertical velocity of the water column (currents)
CurrVert
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.988+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Any enumeration (e.g. count, number per square metre) of viruses in any body of fresh or salt water.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Virus abundance in water bodies
VirAbundWater
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.992+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Includes visible waveband measurements at discrete wavelengths and PAR integrated values as photon and energy fluxes. Does not include satellite radiometer and associated calibration parameters (e.g. water-leaving radiance and reflectance)
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Visible waveband radiance and irradiance measurements in the atmosphere
Atm_VisRad
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:34.996+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Includes measurements at discrete wavelengths and PAR integrated values, measurements as photon and energy fluxes.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Visible waveband radiance and irradiance measurements in the water column
WC_VisRad
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:35.000+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: Lipids are defined as small water-insoluble biomolecules including fats, fatty acids, esters, sterols, isoprenoid compounds, etc.. Water body includes any body of fresh or salt water. As lipids are insoluble in water the concencentrations are associated with the particulate phase.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Water body lipid concentrations
WC_Lipids
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:35.006+0000

CodeDefinition.gml:description: A measure of the tendency of any body of fresh or salt water to either gain or lose electrons when it is subject to change by introduction of a new species.
CodeDefinition.gml:name: Water body redox potential
RC_redox
CodeDefinition.gml:remarks: This definition has been updated on 2012-02-28T14:01:35.011+0000
